You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesK K] > &kappa;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Kappa;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/039a/index.htm U+0039A].
  * `&kappa;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03ba/index.htm U+003BA].
